org.deri.tarql

Class CharsetDetectingReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • org.deri.tarql.CharsetDetectingReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable

    public class CharsetDetectingReader
extends java.io.Reader
    A Reader that wraps an InputStream and automatically takes care of guessing the input stream's encoding, using the jchardet library. Guessing is done on the fly without rewinding.
